short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switch between HTTP proxies quickly and easily

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The WonderProxy Switcher allows you to switch between HTTP proxy servers quickly and easily to speed up your website testing. Import proxies from your WonderProxy account or add your own custom servers.
---

Changelog:

Latest version

Version 6.1.1
December 12, 2024
 - Add a list of domains which should never be proxied, to prevent a browser bug where the proxy auth box pops up on the new tab page

Version 6.1.0
May 17, 2024
 - Keep active proxy when browser is restarted

Version 6.0.0
May 7, 2024
 - Support Manifest V3 (MV3)
 - Change to accepted filters format
 - Transition users with enabled MV2 filters onto MV3 filters format

Version 5.1.4
December 19, 2023
 - Security updates to how internal library code is modified

Version 5.1.3
December 4, 2023
 - Security updates to internal image loading functionality

Version 5.1.2
November 20, 2023
 - Security updates

Version 5.1.1
July 12, 2023
 - Security updates

Version 5.1.0
March 22, 2023
 - Introduce account access checking features
 - Improvements to the account options page design

Version 5.0.1
February 28, 2023
 - Security improvement in geolocation content script
 - Fix for bug where browser geolocation did not work in an iframe

Version 5.0.0
February 14, 2023
 - Remove password authentication for WonderProxy proxies in favour of Proxy Tokens
 - Change WonderProxy account import format and validation process
 - Simplify user onboarding process
 - Replace Credentials page with Account page

Version 4.8.2
January 19, 2023
 - Dependency updates


Older versions


Version 4.8.1
January 13, 2022
 - Backend updates

Version 4.8.0
November 4, 2021
 - Added toggle to allow users to enable/disable matching their browser location to the proxy location. 

Version 4.7.2
August 10, 2021
 - Fix warnings generated by automated tooling, to help browser approve us faster
 - Correct the size of an icon

Version 4.7.1
June 22, 2021
 - Include province/state information when available
 - Allow search of province/state information
 - Fix onboading bug

Version 4.7.0
February 17, 2021
 - Adding support for Proxy Tokens, a new way of authenticating with proxy servers.

Version 4.6.5
January 6, 2021
 - Bugfix for websites using Basic Auth, switcher will now allow credential prompt to display

Version 4.6.3
November 11, 2020

 - Internal changes to reduce permissions required from browsers
 - Bugfix for WatchPosition in Firefox for filtered domains

Version 4.6.1
Released October 2, 2020
 - Servers with a Lat or Long of 0 will no longer appear as custom servers
 - watchPosition will now correctly return a watchID
 - Editing a custom server will no longer unstar it

Version 4.6.0
Released September 16, 2020
- Added detailed error messaging in onboarding credential check

Version 4.5.1
Released September 14, 2020
- Security fixes: WON-01-002, WON-01-006, WON-01-007, WON-01-003

Version 4.5.0
Released April 1, 2020
- Add functionality to star favourite proxies for easy access
- Fix window focus when launching settings from private browsing mode in Chrome & Edge

Version 4.4.0
Released Feb 12, 2020
- Add Switcher version information to WP.com account page 
- Ensure current proxying proxy stays active when users import their server list

Version 4.3.0
Released Jan 13, 2020
- A few fixes for the Edge release

Version 4.2.0
Released Jan 13, 2020
- Rebranded Switcher

Version 4.1.2
Released Dec 12, 2019 
- Fix for upgrading to the new React extension: add function to port user data 

Version 4.0.0
Released Dec 12, 2019 
- Rewrote the extension in React/ES6, added build system etc.

Version 3.1.0
Released Aug 26, 2019 
- Provides latitude and longitude data for all WonderProxy servers. The extension will update your browser location so it reflects the location of the proxy when connected to a WonderProxy server.

Version 3.0.0
Released Jun 6, 2019 

- Allow users to clear their default credentials
- Display messaging around unsaved changes
- Fix to header fields being editable on first load, when toggled off
- Allow WonderProxy users to verify their credentials

Version 2.0.0
Released May 2, 2019 
- Updated onboarding process
- Removed credentials modal for importing servers
- Allows users to save their headers, even if disabled

Version 1.1.0
Released Apr 23, 2019 

- Add version to settings UI
- Add new filtering options: now supports IPs
- Save the user's preferred reminder time

Version 1.0.0
Released Apr 4, 2019
- Allow access to import json via URL (bug fix)
- Some invisible changes to improve how the switcher communicates
- Some improvements to values being saved when proxy setting is on


Version 0.1.2
Released Mar 12, 2019
- Added search/filter functionality to the top of the extension pop-up. Quickly search your list of proxy servers if you have hundreds!

Version 0.1.1
Released Mar 5, 2019
- Introduced an icon in the pop up to remind users that they have an active domain filter.
- Added a show password option to all of our password fields

Version 0.1.0
Released Jan 7, 2019
- Importing your servers from my/account & json import will no longer clear your existing preferences
- Exit IPs are now properly sorted numerically, if there are more than 9 ips
- Small bug fix to the behaviour for the reminder feature
- Small fix to auto refresh the settings page when servers have been imported


Version 0.0.9
Released Dec 6, 2018
- The last used proxy is now saved for quick proxy selection
- Date of last import is now shown on the settings page for either the WonderProxy or JSON import
- Importing servers from WonderProxy or JSON prompts a credentials modal

Version 0.0.81
Released Nov 19, 2018
- Brand new look for the pop up and options page
- The inclusion/exclusion settings area has been reformatted and renamed "Domain Filters". Note to users, you may need to re-add your domains in this section.

Version 0.0.7
Released Oct 10, 2018
New settings:
- Arbitrary headers
- Ability to exclude or include websites/domains
General:
- Enable extension in Firefox private browsing
- Fix to connection state issues when relaunching browser

Version 0.0.6
Released Jul 4, 2018

Version 0.0.5
Released Apr 30, 2018
- Updated settings to appear in a separate tab (to stay consistent with Chrome)
- Fix to settings input: Enable time input when reminder is checked when settings are loaded initially

Version 0.0.4
Released Feb 8, 2018
- Updated the colour palette & icons to match our website
- We're displaying servers by IP index rather than the port number
- Added a 'start' screen so that users know what to do when they first install the extension

Version 0.0.3
Released Jan 16, 2018
